thread.title: Twitter confirms it’s experimenting with native polls in Tweets - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Twitter confirms it’s experimenting with native polls in Tweets - newsR
text: Twitter is looking at possibly letting users add quick polls to their Tweets. A company spokesperson confirmed the move in a statement to VentureBeat saying “We’re experimenting with a new way to poll users on Twitter.” Right now, it looks like polls are only visible on Twitter’s mobile apps and website, but not on desktop […] »
